about_info_first: Ron is a drifter, entrepreneur, live streamer, musician, women's whisperer, and perhaps most importantly, he doesn't stress about anything, ever. His lifestyle has made him famous. His recipe for success: YouTube.
about_info_second: Always accompanied by his friend and cameraman Pepe, he lets you look into a world that Ron has created for himself personally. Whether it's Ischgl, Miami, Sylt or Charlottenburg - one thing is certain: wherever Ron appears, tornadoes are ignited, champagne bottles are popped and it becomes legendary.
about_info_third: With the Tornado Card you finally get the chance to not only be there on screen, but to EXPERIENCE Ron's lifestyle.
